summary: This statement summarizes our work on race, wealth, and other disparities and how they affect access to financial services and retirement security. For example, we found: Lower-income or minority households were less likely to access traditional banking services and more likely to use costlier products and services, such as payday loans. title: Financial Services: Fair Lending, Access, and Retirement Security
